pages.text: (Yusufu) aravuga ati “Allah aturinde kuba twagira undi dufata usibye uwo twasanganye umutungo wacu. Mu by’ukuri (turamutse tubikoze) icyo gihe twaba tubaye inkozi z’ibibi.”

Nuko bamaze gutakaza icyizere (cyo kuba bakwemererwa kugira undi basiga mu cyimbo cya Benjamini), bariherera bajya inama maze umukuru muri bo aravuga ati “Ese ntimuzi ko so yagiranye namwe isezerano mu izina rya Allah (ko muzamugarura), kandi na mbere mutarubahirije (ibyo mwasezeranye) kuri Yusufu? Bityo, sinzigera mva kuri ubu butaka (Misiri) keretse data abimpereye uburenganzira, cyangwa Allah agaca iteka (ryo kuhava mujyanye), kuko ari we Mukiranuzi usumba abandi.”

(Ati) nimusubire kwa so mumubwire muti “Dawe! Mu by’ukuri umwana wawe yaribye, kandi ibyo duhamya ni ibyo twabonye (kuko basanze ingemeri yabo mu mutwaro we). Kandi (igihe twaguhaga isezerano) ntitwari tuzi ibyihishe (ko aziba bakamusigarana).”
“Unabaze (abatuye) umudugudu twarimo (mu Misiri) ndetse unabaze abagenzi twari kumwe; rwose turavuga ukuri.”

(Yakobo) aravuga ati “Ahubwo imitima yanyu yabashishikarije gukora ikibi (kuri Benjamini mukigeraho). Bityo, kwihangana ni byo byiza (kuri njye), hari ubwo Allah yazabangarurira bose. Mu by’ukuri ni Umumenyi uhebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye.”
Nuko abatera umugongo aravuga ati “Mbega agahinda ntewe no kubura Yusufu!” Maze amaso ye arahuma kubera agahinda (ariko ariyumanganya) kandi ashenguka
Baravuga bati “Turahiye ku izina rya Allah! Ntuzigera ureka kwibuka Yusufu kugeza ubwo ushegeshwe n’agahinda cyangwa kakaguhitana!”
(Yakobo) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri akababaro n’agahinda byanjye mbituye Allah. Kandi nzi ibyo mutazi kuri Allah.”
